title: Hagel Says Rescue Mission At Iraq's Mt. Sinjar Is No Longer Needed
teaser: Fewer Yazidis were on the mountain and they were in better condition than expected, Hagel says. The area has been under siege by militants. Robert Seigel discusses the decision with NPR's David Welna.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
